title: Berlin's dangerous fascination with homemade firecrackers and fireworks
subhead: Police unions and doctors' associations are calling for a ban on the private use of pyrotechnic devices, which cause injuries every New Year's Eve. But the German capital defends its libertarian spirit and its festive reputation.

title: Fine champagnes at affordable prices: Le Monde's selection of the best bubbles for the holiday season
subhead: Rémi Barroux, Stéphane Davet, Laure Gasparotto and Sébastien Jenvrin tasted 181 non-vintage champagnes, known as 'brut sans année,' each priced at no more than €50. They selected 81, from both major champagne houses and independent winemakers.

title: Europe's dramatic decline in pharmaceutical production threatens health sovereignty
